quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didnâ€™t do than by the ones you did do.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: Allen Saunders

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one..
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: An army of deer would be more formidable commanded by a lion, than a an army of lions
author: Proverbs

quote: Leadership is an opportunity to serve. It is not a trumpet call to self-importance.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: Life is like a steering wheel, it only takes one small move to change your entire direction.
author: Kellie Elmore

quote: The only easy day was yesterday.
author: US Navy SEALs

quote: If someone else has done it, I can do it too. If no one has, then I can be the first.
author: Soraya

quote: You make the world a better place by making yourself a better person.
author: Scott Sorrell

quote: The power is in your hands to be anything you want to become.
author: Thabisile Ledwaba

quote: Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: The earth has music for those who listen.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Wisdom is the right use of knowledge. To know is not to be wise. Many men know a great deal, and are all the greater fools for it. There is no fool so great a fool as a knowing fool. But to know how to use knowledge is to have wisdom.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: Wise men learn more from fools than fools from the wise.
author: Cato The Elder

quote: You never know how strong you are, until being strong is your only choice.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Insincerity is always weakness; sincerity even in error is strength.
author: George Henry Lewes

quote: In the end some of your greatest pains become your greatest strengths.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: Only a strong tree can stand alone.
author: Arnold Glasow

quote: We are only as strong as we are united as weak as we are divided.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: It has always seemed that a fear of judgment is the mark of guilt and the burden of insecurity.
author: Criss Jami

quote: silence is not weakness and decency is not pride
author: Arthur Machen

quote: To the world you might be one person, but to one person you might be the world.
author: Anonymous

quote: The opinion of the strongest is always the best.
author: Jean de la Fontaine

quote: Strength is not something you have its something you find.
author: Emma Smith

quote: Never trust a man who speaks well of everybody.
author: John Churton Collins

quote: People come into your life and people leave it... you just have to trust that life has a road mapped out for you.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: The trust of the people in the leaders reflects the confidence of the leaders in the people.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: Whatever happens in life is fine - just trust in that.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: It's the same old story you've heard a thousand times. Somebody's trust gets broken. Somebody's left behind.
author: Travis Tritt

quote: Trust is a great force multiplier.
author: Tom Ridge

quote: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
author: A. Nielsen

quote: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world. Someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
author: Allan K. Chalmers

quote: People are just as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: We are never so happy nor so unhappy as we imagine.
author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quote: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: The thirst after happiness is never extinguished in the heart of man.
author: Jean Jacques Rousseau

quote: Happiness is experienced when your life gives you what you are willing to accept.
author: Ken Keyes Jr.

quote: No burden is so heavy for a man to bear as a succession of happy days.
author: Max Muller

quote: We are more interested in making others believe we are happy than in trying to be happy ourselves.
author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld
